sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; const OneChefRecipe = props => { return (

EFFORTLESS BLACK BEAN CHILI

Ingredients

1. In a large skillet, cook and crumble turkey with onion over medium-high heat until no longer pink, 5-7 minutes. Transfer to a 4-qt. slow cooker.\n 2. Stir in all remaining ingredients except toppings. Cook, covered, on low until flavors are blended, 6-8 hours. Top as desired.

); } export default OneChefRecipe;
